sentences.sentence: Instead, the discovery that each generation has its own nostalgias ends up fuelling a bittersweet farce of a plot, with side-trips to the Belle Époque and the Versailles of Louis XIV.
sentences.translation: 然而，影片所传达的“每代人都有属于自己的怀旧时光”的思想同男主角在法国“美好年代”及路易十四时期凡尔赛宫的旅程一起，为苦乐参半的闹剧情节画上了一个句号。
